name: Impossible Circle The Geometry Dominations
description:
Tap to jump and avoid the obstacles. How many jumps will you do?

Impossible Circle The Geometry Dominations is a one touch game, easy to play but hard to master.

Impossible Circle The Geometry Dominations, you are in a 2D tunnel, you have to tap the screen to jump the sphere and avoid spikes.
Each time you jump you earn a point.

If you collide with a spike: you lose.

How many jumps will you do?
Compare your score in the worldwide Impossible Circle The Geometry Dominations tournament.

Impossible Circle The Geometry Dominations is a game who will test your nerve, patience and your eye skills. In fact, it's the hardest game ever. You have to be concentrate to earn points!

Find our games on Google play store: https://www.amazon.com/s/ref=bl_sr_mobile-apps?_encoding=UTF8&field-brandtextbin...
